mapper.sql: house_id as houseId, is_sold, click, name, address, size, division, price, type, description, picture
mapper.select:
select
from rl_house
or name like concat('%', #{condition}, '%')
or address like concat('%', #{condition}, '%')
or division like concat('%', #{condition}, '%')
or type like concat('%', #{condition}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into rl_house (house_id, is_sold, click, name, address, size, division, price, type, description, picture) values (#{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSold,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{division,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into rl_house
house_id,
is_sold,
click,
name,
address,
size,
division,
price,
type,
description,
picture,

mapper.update:
update rl_house
is_sold = #{isSold,jdbcType=TINYINT},
click = #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
division = #{division,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update rl_house set is_sold = #{isSold,jdbcType=TINYINT}, click = #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, division = #{division,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
